name: Chloe: Playtime!
description:
A brand new adventure set in a beautiful world of Toys.

Help Chloe and Bunny reach their goals and win all the challenges set by other toys, Experience all different machine toys, shotguns, flying balloons and much more! explore their vibrant world and the lively cast. Fun lurks at every corner!

DUAL CHARACTER GAMEPLAY

Single player, dual character puzzle solving, play with Chloe and Bunny at the same time!

CRAFTED FUNNY PUZZLES

Enjoy beautiful levels filled with the rich mechanics, Lively toys, using brand new interactions to explore the changing dynamics between characters.

EYE PLEASING VISUALS

Artwork inspired by an eclectic mixture of crafted toys style, retro arcade theme, and personal influences, each translated into stunning pixel artwork.

BLACK N WHITE MODE

The beautiful Artwork is even better in black n white mode, hidden with one of the toys in the toy world, you gotta talk to "him" to get this ability ;)

ANY ORIENTATION
Play single handed or both! The game works in both portrait and landscape orientations!

COLLAPSE
